The screenshot links work. But you have manually open a new tab and then copy and paste the links into the address bar and hit enter. Because imageshack blocks TPB's referrer. That's all.

File size is too small for 720p. Lots of shitty artefacts. I have a 480p rip on my hdd which looks way better. Please, stop making ridiculous '720p' rips. For that file size, stick to 480p or you won't get any reasonable quality out of it. On a very small screen your rips may look ok. But on a medium sized one they already look like garbage. 480p is the way to go if you want to good quality at that size. Learn to rip.
